Agile Feet.name: Agile Feet
Agile Feet.duration: until the end of the current turn

Aqueous Blast.name: 水能爆 Aqueous Blast
Aqueous Blast.description:
你伸出拳头，在拳头周围激起一股水花。在你的回合结束前，你可以使用具有攻击和专注特征的单动作，用水流冲击30尺范围内的目标。当你这样做时，尝试远程法术攻击检定。如果命中，你造成2d8钝击伤害。如果重击，受到冲击的目标会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

升阶(+1) 伤害增加1d8。

Arcane Weaving.name: 奥法编织 Arcane Weaving
Arcane Weaving.description:
在这个将魔法学问与艺术相结合的复杂仪式中，你和次要施法者一起编织法术（如果是半蛛人，则为丝绸），参与者能够彼此分享他们的所知法术。

成功 你或次要施法者可以将法术库中的任一法术替换为其他参与者的法术库中的一个法术。这个法术不能比仪式的等级更高。

失败 参与者不能替换法术。

大失败 如失败，并且所有参与者在24小时内@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，且24 小时内呆滞状态不能低于1。
Arcane Weaving.cost: rare silks worth a total value of 20 gp x the spell level

Ash Form.name: 灰烬形态 Ash Form
Ash Form.description:
你转变为了细微灰烬颗粒组成的云。你获得快速愈合3、对穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗力10并且免疫出血、坠落伤害、和精准伤害。你不能在穿过实心物体，但你可以穿过微小的缝隙，就好像它们是困难地形。任何具有气air特征的能力，包括吹出强风或改变风势（如造风术），只要你在范围内，都会在它的正常效果外，对你每轮造成每法术环级[[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]]伤害。

升阶(9环) 抗力提升到15。

Ashen Wind.name: 灰烬之风 Ashen Wind
Ashen Wind.description:
你召唤出一股旋转的灰烬之风吹过目标区域。该区域中的每一个生物都必须尝试一次强韧豁免，否则他们会因肺部积灰而反胃。

成功 生物不受影响。
失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。
大失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

Aspirational State.name: Aspirational State
Aspirational State.description:
The primary caster takes an ethereal form composed of the combined drive of every caster to exorcise a malevolent spirit. In this form the primary caster can automatically locate the target of this common goal, and they can orient the secondary casters to this location. The primary caster can't interact with physical objects in this form, but they can interfere with the abilities of other incorporeal creatures, including spirits possessing a physical body. The primary caster can also manifest the collective intent of the ritual's participants as shifts in reality that further the casters' goal. These shifts manifest as Aspiration Points, which the secondary casters can spend on the Material Plane to aid their cause. Using Aspiration Points is described on page 7.

The magical feedback created by this ritual renders teleportation magic unstable. Any attempt by the casters or the target of the ritual to use an ability with the teleportation trait automatically fails while the ritual is in effect. When the duration expires, the primary caster must spend 1 Aspiration Point to return to the Material Plane; if insufficient Aspiration Points remain, then the primary caster becomes trapped in the Ethereal Plane.

大成功 The PCs gain 8 Aspiration Points. The strong connection between all the casters gives the secondary casters resistance 5 to negative damage for the remainder of the adventure.

成功 The PCs gain 6 Aspiration Points.

失败 The PCs gain 4 Aspiration Points. The tenuous connection between the casters makes them vulnerable to entropy, giving the secondary casters weakness 5 to negative damage for the remainder of the adventure.
Aspirational State.cost: totems related to the associated goal
Aspirational State.secondarycheck: DC 24 Arcana, Athletics, Nature, Occultism, Performance, Religion, or Society (DC 27 for levels 9-10)

Astral Labyrinth.name: Astral Labyrinth
Astral Labyrinth.description:
You connect the entire area with an invisible maze of astral energy that interferes with dimensional and mental magic. Choose a point in the area that you can see when you cast this spell. Objects other than force effects and rare metals can't block this spell's area. Astral labyrinth attempts to counteract magical mental effects targeting or including anyone other than the caster in the area, though it has no effect on mental effects that began outside the area or before the spell was cast.

In addition, any creature that tries to depart or arrive in a location in the area by teleportation or extradimensional travel (including extradimensional spaces) must attempt a Will saving throw. Summoned creatures must attempt the save when they are summoned, but not when the summoning ends.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}, you are mentally alerted that something has failed its save against this spell, and the creature arrives in the empty space closest to the point you chose instead of its intended destination.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}, you get a mental glimpse of its appearance, and the creature arrives in the empty space closest to the point you chose instead of its intended destination.

升阶(10环) You and creatures transported by your spells can't get a result worse than success on the saving throw to teleport into or out of the area.

Blackfinger's Blades.name: Blackfinger's Blades
Blackfinger's Blades.description:
You pray for swift and painful death to your enemies and find your and your allies' weapons blessed to deliver just that.

The target weapons are coated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QGXNqpP5KvSldoZz]{Giant Scorpion Venom} with a DC equal to your spell DC.

The effects remain on a weapon for 1 minute or until the weapon deals damage, whichever comes first.
Blackfinger's Blades.target: up to 4 weapons, each wielded by a separate willing creature within range

Blazing Blade.name: 炽热之刃 Blazing Blade
Blazing Blade.description:
一道弯刀状的火光从你空闲手中涌出。在法术持续期间，你可以使用具有攻击和专注特征的单动作，用炽热之刃燃烧敌人。当你这样做时，进行一次法术攻击检定。成功时，炽热之刃会造成1d6火焰伤害，加上1d6善良伤害再加上你的施法属性调整值。在大成功时，它会造成双倍伤害。

升阶(4环) 火焰伤害增至2d6。大成功时，目标承受1d6持续善良伤害。

升阶(6环) 火焰伤害增至3d6。大成功时，目标承受2d6持续善良伤害。

升阶(8环) 火焰伤害增至4d6。大成功时，目标承受3d6持续善良伤害。

Blightburn Blast.name: Blightburn Blast
Blightburn Blast.description:
You channel a blast of powerful blightburn radiation from your hands. You deal 4d6 poison damage to creatures in the area. Creatures who fail their save are afflicted with stage 1 of blightburn sickness (on a critical failure, the creature moves immediately to stage 2). The level of blightburn sickness caused by this spell is equal to twice the spell's level, and the disease's save DC uses the caster's DC.

Blightburn Sickness (uncommon, disease) Level 15

The ceiling of the vault of the Black Desert is studded with deadly crystals that glimmer like stars above the dark sands. These crystals are radioactive and flood the vault with lethal energy. Creatures other than those native to the vault or who have survived there for a long time develop a disease called blightburn sickness.

Creatures native to the Black Desert are immune, as are creatures who are affected by blightburn sickness but recover from it. The target can't recover from the disease's drained or sickened condition except by magic.

The surest way to avoid contracting blightburn sickness is by wearing a blightburn ward, a piece of protective jewelry often found among urdefhans' gear or for sale in Shraen.

Saving Throw DC 32 Fortitude

Onset [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1 week)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3} (1 month)

Stage 5 Drained increases by 1 (1 year)

Blind Eye.name: Blind Eye
Blind Eye.description: You enchant a single object, preventing it from being used for magical observation. If you cast this spell on a non-magical item used to cast scrying spells, such as a spell component pouch or a spell focus, the item can't be used to cast the spell. If you cast blind eye on a magical item that can be activated to scry (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.RM3SR1omNZfppZGl]{Crystal Ball} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ACa9QlFqdmW4s2Th]{Hag Eye}), the item can't be activated for scrying effects. Magical items that are twice blind eye's spell level or more aren't blocked this way.
Blind Eye.duration: 直到你下次进行日常准备

Blood Duplicate.name: Blood Duplicate
Blood Duplicate.description: This spell deals you 1 piercing damage as you shape a magical duplicate of the target from your blood; you can't cast this spell if you don't have blood. This spell can't duplicate an item made of precious materials, or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. If you're ever more than 5 feet from the duplicate, the spell's duration immediately ends. The Perception DC to recognize the duplicate as false using any sense except touch is equal to 10 + your spellcasting ability modifier + your Crafting proficiency bonus. The item feels wet and obviously fake to the touch. When the spell ends, the item collapses into a puddle of blood that quickly evaporates.
Blood Duplicate.target: 1 non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less

Blood Feast.name: 血腥盛宴 Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description:
你的头部垂直分裂为一张血盆大口，吞食目标的血液，造成12d6穿刺伤害，并使用你的法术攻击骰。在法术结束后，你的头部重新缝合在一起，就像它从未分裂过一样。你获得1分钟的临时HP，数值等同于目标受到的穿刺伤害的一半。

如果你是一名古革巨人，则该法术将增加2d6穿刺伤害，重击时你造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}也会增加1d8。这个法术不会改变古革巨人的外形。

大成功 该生物受到双倍的伤害及@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success]。

成功 该生物受到完整的伤害。

失败 你没有命中，该生物不受到伤害。

升阶(+1) 穿刺伤害增加2d6，重击时的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}增加1。

Blunt the Final Blade.name: Blunt the Final Blade
Blunt the Final Blade.description:
You anoint the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5Q5MfHX43Sjm8C6Z]{Final Blade} with powdered mithral and grave dirt while speaking softly and carefully to the souls trapped within it. You create a mystical pathway for the souls to escape through and urge them to draw out the magic of the final blade with them as they depart.

大成功 As success, and the souls also grant a boon; the primary and secondary casters gain a +2 status bonus to saves against death and fear effects for the next year.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.eotqxEWIgaK7nMpD]{法术效果: Blunt the Final Blade (大成功)}

成功 The souls escape the final blade and peacefully pass on to their eternal rewards, as appropriate for each soul. The final blade is no longer magical; it can't store anymore souls and can be destroyed as a normal guillotine.

失败 The ritual has no effect.

大失败 The ritual goes horribly wrong. The souls within the final blade are released in a furious rush as a gray death that does its best to slay the ritual's casters and run amok among the living. The final blade retains it abilities and can continue to store souls.
Blunt the Final Blade.cost: powdered mithral and rare grave dirt worth 10,000 gp
Blunt the Final Blade.secondarycheck: Arcana, Crafting, Society, and the other skill not used for the primary check

Caster's Imposition.name: Caster's Imposition
Caster's Imposition.description:
A magical interference prevents the target from contributing to any form of cooperative spellcasting. On a failed save, the target can't participate in any ritual unless they can cast the ritual alone, and they can't access any spells provided by a coven or similar cooperative ability.

升阶(4环) Increase the duration to 1 hour.

升阶(5环) Increase the duration to 1 day.

Clawsong.name: Clawsong
Clawsong.description:
You sing a fierce prayer, low and growling, and awaken the ancient spirit of a Terwa beast to guide and strengthen the target's unarmed blows.

The target's claw attack gains the versatile (piercing) trait, and deals 1d6 slashing damage. If the target's claw attack already deals 1d6 slashing damage, it deals 1d8 instead.

If its claw attack already had the versatile (piercing) trait, it gains the deadly 1d8 trait.

升阶(4环) The spell can affect up to 6 willing creatures with unarmed claw Strikes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.CWC2fPmlgixoIKy5]{法术效果: Clawsong (Damage Increase D6)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.afJCG4vC5WF5h5IB]{法术效果: Clawsong (Damage Increase D8)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.g4E9l4uA62LcRBJS]{法术效果: Clawsong (Versatile Piercing)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.zdpTPf157rXl3tEJ]{法术效果: Clawsong (Deadly D8)}
Clawsong.target: 1 willing creature with an unarmed claw Strike

Cleansing Flames.name: Cleansing Flames
Cleansing Flames.description: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.

Construct Mindscape.name: Construct Mindscape
Construct Mindscape.description:
You create an entirely mental environment called an immersive mindscape. It can have any appearance you and the secondary casters imagine and hold in your minds as you execute the ritual. A mindscape is typically veiled, disguising its nature as a mental construct, but you can choose to make it overt. Even a veiled mindscape has some signs it's not a real place that can be revealed through close inspection or by spending a long time there. Most mindscapes are incapable of physically harming those inside. Even though the mindscape you create is limited in dimension, it appears to have a convincing environment around it, such as a sky and clouds.

大成功 You create a mindscape approximately a half-mile in length and width, and 50 feet in height (large enough to contain a typical village). The GM might allow you to make it larger if it has little detail, such as a grassy plain. You and any secondary casters of your choice can enter it and you can leave a doorway that you and any creatures you designate can pass through.

成功 As critical success, but the mindscape is approximately 25 feet in length, width, and height (like a modest house).

失败 You can't hold the image together and it falls apart.

大失败 Your secret desires horribly warp the mindscape into a distorted mirror of what you intended.

升阶(6环) The duration is 1 week.

升阶(9环) The duration is 1 year, and the area on a critical success is 1 mile in length and width.

升阶(10环) The duration is unlimited, and the area on a critical success is 1 mile in length and width. The cost increases to 2,000 gp.
Construct Mindscape.cost: precious clay, wood, or other modeling materials worth spell level × 20 gp

Control Sand.name: Control Sand
Control Sand.description:
You whip up a small sandstorm around your body. When a creature starts its turn in the area or moves into the area, it must succeed at a Fortitude save or become dazzled for as long as it remains in the area; it is then temporarily immune to this dazzling effect for 10 minutes.

Choose one of the following additional effects when you cast this spell. On subsequent rounds, you can switch to a different effect once per round as a free action triggered by sustaining the spell.

  • Sand Shield You create a magical shield made of sand. The sand shield provides no benefit to AC, but it does allow you to use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction and acts as a shield for this purpose. The sand shield has Hardness 14, 21 Hit Points, and no Broken Threshold; when the shield's HP are reduced to 0, you can't use its Shield Block reaction again until the next time you Sustain the Spell and choose the sand shield effect.
  • Sandblast You direct a jet of sand at a single target. One creature of your choice within 30 feet takes 8d6 slashing damage (basic Reflex save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 minute.
  • Sandstorm The area of the spell expands to a 30-foot emanation, and any creature that starts its turn in the area or moves into the area takes 6d4 slashing damage (basic Reflex save) and must hold its breath or begin suffocating.

Corpse Communion.name: Corpse Communion
Corpse Communion.description:
The dead hold more secrets than the living ever shall. The lore possessed by the dead will only increase as time marches on. To be alive is to define your knowledge as being limited, but with the corpse communion ritual, you can, if only for a short time and through a narrow aperture, tap into the greater lore of the dead and make use of it for your own designs.

When you perform this grisly ritual, you consume a portion of a dead body, taking the decayed flesh and old bones into your system while also taking into your mind the memories etched into those mortal remains. The corpse from which you harvest your necromantic meal cannot have been dead for longer than 1 month, and it need not even be entirely intact, but enough should be present to form what would be regarded as a satisfying meal. If, in life, the corpse was the same ancestry as your own, then you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the primary check to cast corpse communion. Note that when you perform corpse communion, the remains you consume are largely a symbolic bridge between this material world and the world of the dead. The ritual allows you to tap into the vast amount of knowledge and secrets held by the dead as a whole, not simply knowledge that may have once been held by the creature you feed upon.

When you perform this ritual, select a single Intelligence‑, Wisdom‑, or Charisma‑based skill whose secrets you wish to delve into, but in which you possess no greater proficiency in than trained.

The ritual itself does not protect you from potential infection from eating decayed flesh, and at the GM's discretion, performing this ritual could expose you to a disease, curse, or other affliction.

If you perform corpse communion again while already under its effects, the effects of any previous success or critical success are replaced by the results of the new ritual casting.

大成功 You learn a significant piece of lore, a forgotten secret, or some other tantalizing nugget of knowledge that is of immediate use to you, connected to the skill you chose. The GM will provide you with some piece of information they know will aid you in your personal goals. In addition, you become trained in the use of the selected skill and gain a +1 status bonus on checks made with that skill.

成功 You become expert in the use of the selected skill.

失败 You fail to learn anything from the communion.

大失败 A malevolent spirit, be it a supernatural presence sensing an opportunity or the soul of the corpse you're feeding upon, lashes out at you as you feed, drawing from you your memories and secrets and taking them away into the realm of the dead forever. You not only become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3}, but you no longer know the corpse communion ritual. You can attempt to learn it again, but the DC to learn this ritual increases by 5.

升阶(4环) The remains can be up to 10 years old‑dry bones in sufficient enough quantity to gnaw upon will suffice. You can choose a skill you are trained or untrained in, and when you are successful at this ritual, you become master at that skill. The ritual duration extends to 1 week.

升阶(8环) The remains can be up to 100 years old‑dry bones in sufficient enough quantity to gnaw upon will suffice. You can choose a skill you are trained or untrained in, and when you are successful at this ritual, you become master at that skill. The ritual duration extends to 1 month.

升阶(10环) The limit on how old the corpse must be is removed entirely-as long as enough remains, even if it's just a single skull, you can perform the ritual. You can choose a skill you are trained or untrained in, and when you are successful at this ritual, you become legendary at that skill. The ritual duration is permanent until you cast corpse communion again.
Corpse Communion.cost: rare spices and seasonings worth a total value of 50 gp × the spell level

Dawnflower's Light.name: 晨花之辉 Dawnflower's Light
Dawnflower's Light.description:
该物体发出柔和的金色光芒，能揭露真相，显示隐藏的物体，并照射出超自然光芒到虚假的命令上。物体放射出60尺半径明亮光（之后的60尺为昏暗光）。在亮光范围内，通过察觉检定来确定隐藏物体的位置（包括密门，但不包括陷阱），通过意志检定来抵抗视觉幻觉，通过意志检定来抵抗邪恶生物施加的受控制状态，这些都获得+2状态加值。此光可以压制法术等级等于或低于晨花之辉的魔法黑暗。

最后，此法术所产生的超自然的光线类似于阳光，虽然它不能伤害通常会被阳光伤害的生物，但确实使它们感到不舒服，因此它们在明亮光区域时对抗恐惧效果的豁免受到-2状态减值。

升阶(7环) 状态加值提升至+3。

升阶(9环) 状态加值提升至+4。
Dawnflower's Light.target: 一件负载为1或以下的无主非魔法物品

Deluge.name: Deluge
Deluge.description:
You unleash a catastrophic downpour in the area that vanishes an instant later. All flying creatures in the area descend 50 feet or until blocked by the ground or firm surface. Each creature whose descent was blocked by the ground or firm surface takes bludgeoning damage equal to the number of feet it fell (the creature does not also take falling damage) and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}. Creatures on the ground, including flying creatures forced to the ground by the spell, must succeed at a Reflex save or be pushed 50 feet away from the center of the area.

Flimsy structures in the area collapse. The GM can determine other large-scale effects that result from the deluge.

升阶(+1) The area increases by 10 feet, and flying creatures fall an additional 10 feet.

Devour Life.name: Devour Life
Devour Life.description: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force. The target takes 60 negative damage with a basic Fortitude save. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it dies immediately. You regain Hit Points equal to half the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistance and the like). Any excess healing is gained as temporary Hit Points, which you lose after 1 minute.

Div Pact.name: 妖灵契约 Div Pact
Div Pact.description:
你呼唤末日荒原的力量来赋予你来自妖灵的帮助。你会呼唤来1只妖灵，其等级无法高于妖灵契约环级的2倍；2只妖灵，每只妖灵等级不超过法术环级的两倍减2；或者3只妖灵，每只妖灵的等级不超过法术环级的两倍减3。

大成功 你呼唤来1只或多只妖灵，他们会不求回报地为你服务。

成功 你呼唤来1只或多只妖灵，他们并不急于完成任务，因此会要求你欠下人情作为回报。

失败 你未能呼唤任何妖灵前来。

大失败 你未能呼唤任何妖灵前来，而且它们会发出精神反冲，导致你在24小时内无法使用任何内在神术法术。若你当前正处于任何自己的内在神术法术的效果影响下，那么该效果会立即结束。
Div Pact.primarycheck: 宗教(专家；你必须是妖灵)

Entrancing Eyes.name: 迷人魔眼 Entrancing Eyes
Entrancing Eyes.description:
你的双眼闪耀着迷人的光辉，捕获任何与你目光相会的人。任何在弥漫范围内结束回合的生物必须进行一次意志豁免。

大成功 该目标不受影响并对这一次法术免疫。

成功 该目标不受影响。

失败 在它的下一轮结束为止，目标处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}与@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}状态。

大失败 直到它的下一回合结束为止，该目标处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 4}，迷魂状态，并且无法使用反应动作。除此之外，你以外的任何生物及物体对该目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

每轮你维持这个法术时，你可以使用一个单独的动作（拥有操作特征），将你的迷人魔眼专注在30尺内你可以看见的一名单独的生物身上。该生物必须立刻进行一次意志豁免对抗这个法术，就如同它在弥漫范围内结束回合一样。如果该生物已经在先前的豁免中被你的迷人魔眼所迷魂，这次失败的豁免就会让它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。每轮你无法使用这个动作多次专注于同一个生物。

Exchange Image.name: Exchange Image
Exchange Image.description:
To mislead pursuers, the Lacunafex developed the means to swap visages. You trade appearances with the target, with the effects depending on the result of the target's Will saving throw. Willing and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} targets automatically critically fail this saving throw.

大成功 No effect.

成功 You take on the target's appearance, and they take yours. This has the same effects as a 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} spell, except that the target can't Dismiss the disguise. The duration is 1 minute or until Dismissed.

失败 As success, but the duration is 1 hour or until Dismissed.

大失败 As success, but the duration is 24 hours.

Fear the Sun.name: Fear the Sun
Fear the Sun.description:
You cause the creature's vision to become particularly sensitive. The creature must attempt a Fortitude save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is dazzled for 1 minute.

大失败 The creature gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{Light Blindness} for 1 minute. If the creature is already exposed to bright light, it immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, as it isn't acclimated to its newly acquired light blindness.

升阶(6环) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Fey Abeyance.name: 隔绝精类 Fey Abeyance
Fey Abeyance.description:
区域 一个不超过60 尺×60尺的封闭区域，高度不超过20尺

你用寒铁铃铛守护一个区域，保护它不受第一世界的影响。精类生物在该区域内会感到不舒服，并且在计算弱点和抗力时，所有针对它们的物理攻击都被认为是寒铁的。此外，你在该区域的3个方格内放置铃铛（通常在入口处）。当一个精类生物在放有铃铛的方格中开始其回合时，如果它有寒铁弱点，它会受到相同数量的心灵伤害。这是非致命伤害。

大成功 你最多可以在6个方格放置铃铛。

成功 仪式成功生效。

失败 仪式未能生效。

大失败 仪式未能生效，并引起了一个会惹麻烦的精类生物的注意。根据GM的判断，它可能是敌对的，也可能只是淘气。
Fey Abeyance.cost: rare oils, cold iron bells worth at least 5 gp
Fey Abeyance.secondarycheck: 手艺, 威吓, 神秘, 表演

For Love, For Lightning.name: 为了爱，赐与雷霆 For Love, For Lightning
For Love, For Lightning.description:
当你施放法术时，你将所需的武器插在地上，而武器迸发出了绯红雷霆。在你施放法术，以及在你每个随后的回合中第一次维持法术时，绯红电光跃动。当武器发出电光，你选择的一个位于武器30尺范围内的敌人受到3d12电击伤害（基本反射豁免）。如果你以交互动作从地面拔出武器，该法术结束。

升阶(+2) 伤害增加1d12.

Forgotten Lines.name: Forgotten Lines
Forgotten Lines.description:
Members of the Lacunafex and other allies use this spell to restore material that Thrune agents have redacted from historical or otherwise valuable texts. You learn one piece of information that was removed from the target text after its creation. You can instead learn one piece of information from a text that had been destroyed, but you must have a fragment of the text, such as a piece of the cover, a page, or even a clasp or metal fittings.

升阶(6环) The spell reconstructs all missing information regarding a specific topic of your choice.

升阶(9环) The spell also reveals information the writer self-censored and didn't commit to paper.

Form of the Sandpoint Devil.name: Form of the Sandpoint Devil
Form of the Sandpoint Devil.cost: igneous stones and gems worth 1,500 gp, bat wings, horse hooves, and at least one lizard

Gasping Marsh.name: Gasping Marsh
Gasping Marsh.description:
With a rattling hiss, you create a quickly evaporating mist of invisible poisonous marsh gas to smother creatures in the area. When you Sustain the Spell, the mist dissipates completely from the previous area, and you can select a new area within range to fill with the mist. If you don't Sustain the Spell, the mist dissipates and the spell ends.

You deal 4d6 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the area. Each affected creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

The creature is then temporarily immune to gasping marsh for 1 minute.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

大失败 The creature takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}, and takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d8.success].

Girzanje's March.name: Girzanje's March
Girzanje's March.description:
You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song. Allied creatures who can hear and understand you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Fortitude saves, and Will saves against mental effects.

升阶(7环) The status bonus increases to +2.

升阶(10环) The status bonus increases to +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.QJRaVbulmpOzWi6w]{法术效果: Girzanje's March}

Gritty Wheeze.name: 砂息术 Gritty Wheeze
Gritty Wheeze.description:
你喷出一片裹挟着干燥岩砾与沙石的云团。该区域中的生物受到2d4 钝击伤害并且必须尝试一次强韧豁免。

对于水生生物与植物生物（含有特征水与植物的生物）来说，其豁免结果将下降一个等级。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受全额伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1 轮。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害并目眩1 分钟。

升阶(+1) 该伤害增加2d4。

Hypnopompic Terrors.name: Hypnopompic Terrors
Hypnopompic Terrors.description:
You send a wave of nightmarish visions crashing over your targets, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} by fear. These visions inflict real wounds on vulnerable targets, dealing 6d12 mental damage. If you target a sleeping creature, it wakes up as it attempts the save but takes one degree of success worse than the result it rolled on its save.

大成功 The target is unaffected.

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} and takes half the mental damage.

失败 The target is frightened 2, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round, and takes the full mental damage.

大失败 The target is frightened 2, is paralyzed for 2 rounds, and takes double the mental damage.

Incarnate Ancestry.name: Incarnate Ancestry
Incarnate Ancestry.description:
You attempt to reach back through time to make brief contact with one of the many past lives of the willing creature, then transform their current body to incarnate elements of that past life's ancestry into the present. At the GM's option, a creature might not have any past lives to draw from, in which case this ritual fails. A PC should always be able to make full use of this ritual if it's cast on them should the GM chooses to allow this ritual into their game.

While incarnate ancestry can be cast anywhere, if cast in the vicinity of a site infused with energies conducive to reincarnation and contacting past lives (such as in area D7 of the Sanctum of the Cleansed), checks made to perform this ritual gain a +4 circumstance bonus.

大成功 You infuse the creature with elements from a previous incarnation. The character can reselect all ancestry feats, or even select an entirely new ancestry (choosing from those allowed by the GM). The newly incarnated ancestry must still fully support other character build options; you can't choose feats or ancestries that would invalidate class choices. The character is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 10 minutes as they acclimate to their new body.

成功 As critical success, but the transformation is disorienting to the creature, who must come to terms with their new body and the strange echoes of memories from the past life that fade in time. The creature becomes clumsy 1 and stupefied 1 for one week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

失败 The attempt to incarnate ancestry is unsuccessful.

大失败 As failure, but the attempt to transform leaves the creature feeling as if their own body were unfamiliar. They become clumsy 1 and stupefied 1 for one week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Incendiary Ashes.name: 燃火灰烬 Incendiary Ashes
Incendiary Ashes.description:
一团魔法灰烬降落在这片区域的生物身上。灰烬冲刷着肉体、摩挲着伤口，由最微弱的火焰点燃。这片区域的生物受到4d6挥砍伤害，并且必须尝试坚韧豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到一半伤害，并且直到它的下回合开始，获得对火焰的弱点3。

失败 该生物受到完整伤害，并且获得对火焰的弱点3，持续1分钟。如果在这期间，该生物被火焰杀死，它会化为灰烬，但它的装备会留存。

大失败 如失败，除了该生物受到双倍伤害。

升阶(+1) 挥砍伤害提升2d6，
火焰弱点提升1。

Infectious Ennui.name: 倦怠传染 Infectious Ennui
Infectious Ennui.description:
你挥手进行短暂的祈祷，让目标生物的脑海中产生倦怠感，目睹自己迫在眉睫的厄运，目标生物必须进行意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标产生了一时的倦怠。其思想在无意义的存在中挣扎，使其陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，但下一轮目标的回合结束时，法术效果也随之结束。

失败 目标产生倦怠的感觉，陷入缓慢1和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，并且保持缓慢状态，只要法术继续维持，目标的惊惧状态就无法降低到1以下。在目标的回合开始时，选择距离目标30尺内的一个生物尝试意志豁免，如果失败，该生物陷入缓慢 1持续1轮。无论豁免成功与否，该生物都会暂时免疫本次施展的倦怠传染效果（次要目标不会继续传播倦怠）。

大失败 类似失败，但主要目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

升阶(5环) 如果次要目标陷入缓慢，只要法术继续维持，其缓慢效果就会持续存在。

Inkshot.name: 墨水喷射 Inkshot
Inkshot.description:
一股粘稠的有毒墨水从指间射出，喷向目标生物的脸。对目标投掷法术攻击骰。如果命中，你造成2d6点毒素伤害，并且冲击目标的眼睛，带有刺痛感的墨水会模糊扭曲该生物的视觉，使其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。重击时，毒素伤害翻倍，目标受到污浊的墨水影响，目眩1分钟。

墨水污渍会在1小时后褪色，但强力的清洁手段（或法术，比如魔法伎俩）可以在褪色之前去除墨水。

升阶(+1) 增加2d6点基础毒素伤害。

Join Pasts.name: Join Pasts
Join Pasts.description:
With touches to the targets' foreheads, you bring them into mental communion. The targets can share thoughts and experiences, but not words. When one target attempts to Recall Knowledge, the other can Aid the first target's skill check, using any Lore skill (even if that Lore wouldn't normally apply) without having made any preparations to Aid.

升阶 (+1) You can touch one additional target t include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.

Lucky Month.name: Lucky Month
Lucky Month.description:
You imbue the provided token with luck. You choose a single creature within range during the ritual's performance to become the recipient of the token's luck. That creature has access to the token's luck as long as they're wearing the token. If the token is stolen or lost, they lose access to its luck until the token is recovered. The token loses its luck if it's destroyed or after the duration noted in the ritual's effects has elapsed.

大成功 You can call upon the token's luck. Once per week, when rolling a saving throw or skill check, you can use the token's power and roll twice, taking the higher result. This is a fortune effect. The token keeps its luck for 1 month.

成功 As a critical success, except you can only call upon the token's power once during the lucky month.

失败 The ritual has no effect.

大失败 Magical backlash creates ill luck. Once per week, the ritual's recipient must roll twice and take the worse result for their first significant saving throw or skill check of the week, as determined by the GM. This is a misfortune effect. This ill luck remains for 1 month and applies to the recipient whether or not they're wearing the token.
Lucky Month.cost: a favorite food or drink and a wearable token with personal or familial significance worth 10 gp total

Lure Dream.name: Lure Dream
Lure Dream.description: You reach out to the dream realm, beckoning an animate dream to your side. This works like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal}, except you summon an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Y9SDbANT1DWI1DKU]{Animate Dream}.

Mindscape Door.name: Mindscape Door
Mindscape Door.target: yourself and up to 5 willing creatures
Mindscape Door.cost: incense and focusing diagrams worth a total value of the target's level (minimum 1) × 1 gp, for each target
Mindscape Door.secondarycheck: Arcana or Occultism, Deception or Diplomacy, Perception

Mirecloak.name: Mirecloak
Mirecloak.description:
You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers. The shroud settles about each target's shoulders, granting a +1 status bonus to AC and a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks, both only while the target is in dim light or darkness.

If a creature deals damage in melee to or touches a cloaked creature, the cloak wraps around the attacker, temporarily connecting the psyches of the cloaked creature and the attacker and violently prying a random piece of interesting information from the attacker's mind. The attacker takes 2d8 mental damage and must attempt a Will save.

Afterward, the spell ends for the cloaked creature, and the attacker is temporarily immune to mirecloak for 24 hours.

大成功 The attacker is unaffected.

成功 The attacker takes half damage.

失败 The attacker takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}. In addition, the cloaked creature gleans a piece of information from the attacker's mind. The details and extent of this information are at the GM's discretion.

大失败 As failure, but the attacker takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.mzDgsuuo5wCgqyxR]{法术效果: Mirecloak}

Mother's Blessing.name: Mother's Blessing
Mother's Blessing.description:
You attempt to purify and stabilize the life inside of Ulgrem-Axaan's last remaining clutch of eggs. With its blessing, you wash the eggs clean from the filth of undeath and bury them in warm sand by the banks of a river in Garund.

大成功 The ritual is successful and the eggs hatch, giving life to an ancient species brought to the brink of extinction by the destruction of their home.

成功 As critical success, but only half of the eggs hatch (rounded up). You can try again with the remaining eggs.

失败 No effect, and you must wait a week to try again.

大失败 90% of the eggs shatter (rounded up). You must wait a month to try again.
Mother's Blessing.cost: at least 1 gallon of clean river water

Necrotic Radiation.name: 坏死辐射 Necrotic Radiation
Necrotic Radiation.description:
你使得被触碰的物体或是选择的空间充斥着缓慢放射的坏死辐射。如果在一个物体上施放这个法术，任何手持或是携带这个物体结束回合的生物将受到2d6负能量伤害。如果你在一个区域内施放这个法术，则任何在这个区域结束回合的生物受到2d6负能量伤害。你可以用触碰的方式对一个他人持有的物品使用这个法术。在这种情况下，该生物尝试1次反射豁免来减免该效应。

大成功 该物体不受影响。

成功 该生物快速地移开了该物体，法术效果仅持续1分钟。

失败 该生物设法略微保护了这个物体。法术持续10分钟。

大失败 法术持续完整的24小时。

升阶 (+2) 增加辐射的负能量伤害1d6点。

Nettleskin.name: 荨肤术 Nettleskin
Nettleskin.description:
荆棘从你身上冒出，穿过你身上的盔甲和衣物而不造成任何损坏。

用近战攻击或无武装攻击命中你的生物将承受1d4 穿刺伤害，荨麻刺伤他人的同时也将自身折损，每当有一名生物因此承受伤害， 荨肤术的持续时间便减少1 轮。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d4。

Ordained Purpose.name: Ordained Purpose
Ordained Purpose.description:
You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse and agony for acting outside of their station and purpose.

Enemies in the area take 4d6 mental damage and must attempt a Will save. A creature that has lost abilities as a result of performing acts anathema to its deity or beliefs (such as a champion who violated their tenets and hasn't atoned) uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw.

At the GM's discretion, a creature currently filling its appointed station and purpose (such as a farmer working in a field or a criminal in the act of committing a crime) uses the outcome one degree of success better than the result of its saving throw.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage.

失败 The creature takes full damage and must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn.

大失败 The creature takes double damage, must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn, and can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand} during its next turn.

升阶 (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Owb Pact.name: Owb Pact
Owb Pact.description:
You call upon an owb to assist you in a goal. Only caligni callers can use this ritual with relative safety. If a different type of caligni attempts this ritual, they use an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their check. If a non-caligni attempts this ritual, the result is an automatic critical failure.

大成功 You conjure the owb. It decides your goals closely match its own and doesn't request a favor in return.

成功 You conjure the owb. It isn't eager to pursue the task, so it requires a favor in return.

失败 You don't conjure an owb.

大失败 You conjure an owb, but it deems you unworthy and siphons away some of your soul energy. All casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}.

Penumbral Disguise.name: Penumbral Disguise
Penumbral Disguise.description:
You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} while in dim light or darkness.

In addition, the shadows mask the creature's features. While the creature is in dim light or darkness, other creatures must succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} action against the spell's DC to discern details about the target's appearance. For example, without using Seek, other creatures can determine the target's general shape (such as humanoid), but they would need to Seek to determine the target's precise appearance or any other identifying information.

Creatures with darkvision can still see the target and their features normally. The target's normal appearance is revealed in bright light.

升阶(4环) The status bonus is +2. Creatures with darkvision can no longer discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness without Seeking, though creatures with greater darkvision can still determine these details.

升阶(6环) As 4th level, except the status bonus is +3 and creatures without darkvision can't determine even general details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness unless they successfully Seek the target; these creatures see a vague shadow instead. Even on a successful Seek, they only determine general features, though they can see details on a critical success.

升阶(8环) As 6th level, except the status bonus is +4 and even creatures with greater darkvision must Seek to discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.mAofA4oy3cRdT71K]{法术效果: Penumbral Disguise}

Perseis's Precautions.name: Perseis's Precautions
Perseis's Precautions.description:
Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger. Once during the duration of this spell, the target can roll one Perception, Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, or Society initiative roll twice and take the better result, after which the spell ends.

The strain of staying so prepared is too much for a mind to handle for long; the target is temporarily immune to this spell for 24 hours once the spell ends, whether they used the initiative benefit or not.

Phantasmal Protagonist.name: 魅影戏角 Phantasmal Protagonist
Phantasmal Protagonist.description:
你从小说、历史作品或宗教寓言中创造出一个戏剧角色的幻象化身。无论描绘该角色的作品中将该角色的体型描绘成多大，该幻象都为中型体型。你在施法时需要决定这个戏剧角色的类型，可以从英雄、盟友和反派中选择。戏剧角色会出现在法术范围内一个未被占据的空间中，每轮第一次维持该法术时，你可以命令该戏剧角色行走或者采取角色类型赋予的行动。魅影戏角的速度为25尺，AC为22。它的豁免检定调整值，察觉调整值以及技能调整值为+12，它有90点HP。

英雄: 戏剧角色以传奇英雄的形态现身。这一角色赋予的动作是进行一次近战打击，使用你的法术攻击骰进行攻击，在命中时造成4d6+6点心灵伤害。

盟友: 戏剧角色以辨识度高的配角形态现身。这一角色赋予的动作是给予相邻生物4d4临时生命值，持续1轮。

反派: 戏剧角色以臭名昭著的反派形态现身。这一角色赋予的动作是骚扰嘲弄相邻的目标。目标必须成功通过意志豁免，否则就会在你的下一个回合结束前陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}（大失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}）。

升阶(+1) 戏剧角色的AC，豁免检定调整值，技能调整值和察觉调整值增加3点，HP增加30点。英雄戏剧角色的伤害增加1d6。盟友戏剧角色提供的临时生命值增加1d4。

Pillars of Sand.name: Pillars of Sand
Pillars of Sand.description:
You raise one or more pillars of solid sand from the earth. The total height of the pillars is 30 feet, which must be used in 10-foot increments (for example, you could create three 10-foot-tall pillars, one 20-foot-tall pillar and one 10-foot-tall pillar, or one 30-foot-tall pillar). Each pillar is 5 feet by 5 feet in length and width. The pillars must be conjured on a relatively flat area of natural earthen terrain such as sand, dirt, stone, or clay. Regardless of the terrain, the pillars are always made of tightly compacted sand particles that together become as hard and solid as stone (@Check[type:athletics|dc:15|traits:action:climb] to Climb).

If a creature occupies the space where you cast this spell, it is carried upward atop the pillar. The creature can attempt a Reflex save (DC equal to the caster's spell DC); on a success, the creature can either attempt to Grab an Edge or move into an adjacent unoccupied square. If the pillar would rise higher than the ceiling, it firmly abuts the ceiling but does not rise any higher. A creature caught between a pillar and a ceiling takes no damage (subject to GM discretion, such as is in the case of stalactites or other hazards) but becomes immobilized. The creature can attempt an Escape check to free itself, but it must thereafter Grab an Edge, Climb down, or fall from the top of the pillar. The Grab an Edge and Escape DCs are the same as the Reflex save.

As part of your action to Sustain the Spell, you can choose to either destroy one of your pillars, causing it to immediately crumble into nothing, or create a new pillar, as long as doing so wouldn't exceed the total number of feet of pillar you can create. You can Sustain the Spell two or more times on a single turn to destroy or create a pillar.

升阶(+1) The total height of the pillars increases by 10 feet, but must still be used in 10-foot increments (this also increases the total number of pillars that can be created by one).

Prying Survey.name: Prying Survey
Prying Survey.description:
You create eight invisible, floating eyes, each about 3 inches in diameter, that scan the area around you, transmitting rough impressions of the environment. The eyes constantly examine and send you summaries of their findings. They are solid and can't move through barriers, and they don't follow routes that they fail to find while Searching. Any damage to an eye destroys it. When all eyes are destroyed, the spell ends.

As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can concentrate on a location within the area that an eye can reach. An eye travels to that location, and you Seek visually as if you were there. As an exploration activity, you can travel at half speed while continuing to concentrate on the eyes to gain the benefits of both the Scout and Search activities. With the eyes, you can check everything even if you are traveling faster than 300 feet per minute. The eyes use your Perception modifier. You can have only one prying survey in effect at a time.

升阶 (10环) The area increases to a 500-foot emanation.

Radiant Field.name: Radiant Field
Radiant Field.description:
You create an area of bright light. Creatures with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{Light Blindness} that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} by radiant field and remain in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turns. On a failure, a creature remains blinded for 1 round; this is an incapacitation effect.

This spell also suppresses magical darkness of your radiant field spell's level or lower.

升阶 (4环) Creatures seen through the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to creatures with light blindness, even those that are outside the area.

Raga of Remembrance.name: Raga of Remembrance
Raga of Remembrance.description:
You scribe occult symbols on unblighted Vudran ground, laying the ceramics within them to create a ritual space. To perform the ritual, light incense in the ceramics and sit at the center of the ritual space. You then play the disharmonic instrument, drawing on musical skill, occult harmonics, or religious tradition. This establishes an underlying drone atop which the secondary casters layer their own performances. The song calls to the millions who died defending Vudra from Kothogaz, investing their power in Vanitapati, the legendary psychic.

大成功 A towering, ethereal avatar of Vanitapati manifests around you, surrounded by swirling spirits. The avatar weakens Kothogaz's spirit. While Kothogaz is within 1 mile of you, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} and is permanently destroyed if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

成功 As critical success, but Kothogaz is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The dead come to your aid, but their presence is unnerving. As success, but Kothogaz isn't frightened, and the primary and secondary casters take a -1 status penalty to saving throws against emotion effects.

大失败 Rather than the dead, Kothogaz hears the ritual's call and immediately teleports to the primary caster with its Disharmonic Door ability. Primary and secondary casters are afflicted with many-eyed blight.
Raga of Remembrance.cost: ceramics, incense, and pigments worth 100,000 gp
Raga of Remembrance.secondarycheck: Diplomacy or Performance; Nature; Religion or Society

Ravenous Reanimation.name: 掠劫复生 Ravenous Reanimation
Ravenous Reanimation.description:
你用你的吐息武器或者其他强大的魔法摧毁收集来的宝物，然后在以烧焦融化的遗骸为食之前向死灵能量祈求。在你这么做的时候，负能量穿行于你的肉体，自动杀死你。每一条掠劫亡龙的掠劫复生都需要3到5个独特的额外成份。你是否会复活为掠劫亡龙取决于仪式的成功与否。

大成功 仪式完成后你立即复生成掠劫亡龙；你的护体之魂起始为满HP（等于5×你的等级）。

成功 仪式完成24小时后你复活为掠劫亡龙，只要你的遗体还够完整。当你复生为掠劫亡龙时，你的护体之魂起始HP为1。

失败 仪式完成24小时后你复活为掠劫亡龙空骸。

大失败 你死亡。
Ravenous Reanimation.cost: 从转化对象收藏的珍宝中取出的总价值5,0000gp的贵重宝物。
Ravenous Reanimation.primarycheck: 奥法(大师)，神秘(大师)，或宗教(大师)

Ritual Obstruction.name: Ritual Obstruction
Ritual Obstruction.description: You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's level or lower in the area. Ritual obstruction ignores all cover, including walls and ceilings, to the extent of its area. Anyone attempting to cast a ritual within the area knows, when they begin to cast the ritual, the area is cursed to impede rituals. Any ritual cast in the area can't have a final result better than failure.

Scorching Blast.name: 火能爆 Scorching Blast
Scorching Blast.description:
你伸出拳头，在拳头周围激起一团火焰。在你的回合结束前，你可以使用具有攻击和专注特征的单动作，用火焰冲击30尺范围内的目标。当你这样做时，尝试远程法术攻击检定。如果命中，你造成2d8火焰伤害。如果重击，受到冲击的目标会受到1d6持续火焰伤害。

升阶(+1) 基础伤害增加1d8，重击持续火焰伤害增加2点。

Silver's Refrain.name: Silver's Refrain
Silver's Refrain.description:
The "Song of Silver" was an enchanted song used by the Silver Ravens to battle diabolic forces. You pull from select verses to temporarily replicate some of the legendary song's benefits, albeit on a much smaller scale.

Weapon and unarmed attacks by allies in the area are treated as silver. In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} cast by a devil within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using dimension door. If a devil attempts to enter the area using dimension door and the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.

Spiritual Anamnesis.name: Spiritual Anamnesis
Spiritual Anamnesis.description:
Memories of a past life that seem incredibly real (and may even be) overwhelm the target's mind. This is especially disorienting for undead and creatures that have lived a previous life (such as celestials, fiends, monitors, and many other extraplanar creatures); if such creatures roll a critical success on their save, they get a success instead, and if they roll a failure, they get a critical failure instead.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 minute and babbles about the visions, possibly providing information about what they saw.

大失败 As failure, but the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Split the Tongue.name: Split the Tongue
Split the Tongue.description:
The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue. The creature takes 1d8 slashing damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4轮}.

大失败 As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4轮}.

升阶 (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
Split the Tongue.target: A creature within 30 feet fails a Deception or Diplomacy check.

Statuette.name: 缩像术 Statuette
Statuette.description:
这个仪式是缩物术的变体，可以用作超大物体的运输。你将一个物体转变为它本身的微型雕像，负载为L。在物体转变时，该仪式不会缩小任何物体中或之上的生物。这个物体将保持小雕像形态，直到仪式的持续时间结束或是一个生物将其放在稳定的表面并使用10分钟的时间与它交互来放大它。当恢复到原来的体型时，该物体会将其他生物和物体推到一边或是无害地包含它们，如同一个拥有构造物特征的魔法物品。

你的奥法检定结果决定了该物体能维持微型雕像形态多长时间。

大成功 该物体维持小雕像形态一周。

成功 该物体维持小雕像形态一天。

失败 你没能将这个物体缩小。

大失败 你没能将这个物体缩小，而且你携带的最高级的L负载或是更重的物品会缩小成为微型的不可用的小雕像，负载可忽略，持续一周。
Statuette.target: 1 freestanding, non-magical object no larger than 3,000 cubic feet (the size of a Huge creature)

Stormburst.name: Stormburst
Stormburst.description:
Your voice projects like cracking thunder as you summon a localized storm, creating a fearsome surge of lightning and wind that deals 6d6 electricity damage. Each creature must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

大失败 The creature takes double damage, is knocked prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

升阶 (7环) The damage increases to 8d6, and targets who critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

升阶 (9环) The damage increases to 10d6, and targets who critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Summon Healing Servitor.name: Summon Healing Servitor
Summon Healing Servitor.description:
You call forth a servitor forged from raw positive energy to heal and bolster your allies. The servitor occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (healing, necromancy, positive) Servitor's Protection The servitor appears in a flash of light, moving from ally to ally and granting them a temporary reprieve. All allies within 20 feet of the Servitor gain 20 temporary Hit Points until the servitor departs.

Depart (healing, necromancy, positive) Servitor's Blessing The servitor disappears in a 30‑foot emanation of positive energy. All willing living creatures within heal 3d8 Hit Points. All undead within take that much damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

升阶(+2) The Arrive effect's temporary Hit Points increase by 8, and the Depart effect's healing and damage to undead increase by 1d8.

Swampcall.name: Swampcall
Swampcall.description:
You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

成功 生物不受影响。

失败 The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

大失败 As failure, but the penalty to Speeds (except Swim speed) is -15 feet.

升阶(3rd) The range increases to 60 feet, and the area increases to a 20-foot burst.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ROuGwXEvFznzGE9k]{法术效果: Swampcall (Failure)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.otK6eG3b3FV7n2xP]{法术效果: Swampcall (Critical Failure)}

Tattoo Whispers.name: 纹身的耳语 Tattoo Whispers
Tattoo Whispers.description:
你在每个次要施法者身上仔细纹上相同的图案。纹身可以是任何形状或符号，但必须包含一个嘴巴。纹身会在 1 个月内自然消退。

大成功 次要施法者身上的纹身都被魔法连接起来，持续1周，提供一种半心灵感应般的联系。每个次要施法者都可以在任何时候与其他次要施法者秘密交流，方法是口中念念有词但不发出声音。收信人必须在发送者的120尺范围内、必须在发送者的视线范围内、并且必须将纹身显露在外。纹身的嘴巴会根据送来的话语低声呢喃，但只有纹身的持有者能听到。

成功 与大成功一样，但效果只持续1天。

失败 仪式没有效果。

大失败 仪式没有效果，并由于持续的心灵静默而产生反作用。所有施法者都陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1天。
Tattoo Whispers.cost: tattoo inks and silver tattooing needles worth 20 gp for each secondary caster

Terminate Bloodline.name: Terminate Bloodline
Terminate Bloodline.description:
Mighty drow noble houses, including House Shraen, use this ritual to stamp out fledgling noble houses before they rise to power. At the ritual's completion, you place a contagious wasting disease upon the target creature with the intention of ending their familial bloodline.

The ritual is easiest to cast on a subdued target, typically a low-ranking member of the targeted family bloodline who is kidnapped and has their memory wiped. If the target is conscious when the ritual is cast, the target attempts a Fortitude save against the ritual's DC; on a success, the ritual fails. Otherwise, the target is automatically affected by the dying bloodline disease.

Dying Bloodline (curse, disease) Failing or critically failing this disease's Fortitude save causes the disease to progress to the next stage as normal; however, succeeding or critically succeeding at the save has no effect. The disease can be removed only by first successfully counteracting the curse and then counteracting the disease

Level equal to twice the ritual's level

Stage 1 carrier with no effect (1 month)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1 week)

Stage 3 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 4 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 day)

Stage 5 death.

Every member of an infected creature's immediate family (blood relationship or parent or child) that comes into physical contact with that infected creature must attempt a Fortitude save or contract the disease.

大成功 The creature does not contract the disease and does not need to attempt further saves when coming into physical contact with that particular creature (the creature is not immune to the disease, however, and must attempt a save as normal if it comes into physical contact with a different infected family member).

成功 The creature is not affected but must attempt another save the next time they come into physical contact with that particular infected creature.

失败 The creature contracts the disease and can spread it in the same way as the original target.
Terminate Bloodline.target: 1 creature of a level no greater than double the terminate bloodline ritual's level
Terminate Bloodline.cost: a bodily sample from the target, and valuables belonging to the target worth a total value of 100 gp × the spell level × the target's level; Secondary Casters 3

Transcribe Conflict.name: 抄录战报 Transcribe Conflict
Transcribe Conflict.description:
你让一张纸出现在自己手中，片刻后，你在最后一小时内所经历的一场战斗的详细描述会以你选择的语言记录在这张纸上。战斗的描述非常详细，任何花1分钟阅读这张纸的人都可以对这一事件进行回忆知识，就好像这些人曾经就在现场一样，但抄录战报的主要目的是通过研究战斗，从参与者可能犯下的错误或战术失误中吸取经验，使你对战斗拥有更加深刻的洞察力。

当你施放这个法术时，在你抄录的战斗中选择一种类型的敌人，使用你的法术DC-10而非对应技能的调整值对该敌人进行回忆知识。你在这一动作中不能使用回忆知识时触发的任何特殊能力、反应或自由动作。如果你的检定成功，则你不仅可以了解GM设置的敌人信息，而且在抄录战报的剩余时间里面对这类敌人的战斗时先攻检定获得+1状态加值。例如，如果你对一个愤怒恶魔进行该检定，那么加值只适用于愤怒恶魔，不适用其他的恶魔。由GM决定伪装过的敌人是否适用于该检定。

升阶(5环) 先攻加值增加为+2，持续时间增加到8小时。

升阶(8环) 先攻加值增加为+3，持续时间增加到你下次进行每日准备时，并且如果参与了你抄录的战斗的任何盟友在你施法时距离你30尺以内，则先攻检定的状态加值对他们也同样有效。

Undermine Reality.name: Undermine Reality
Undermine Reality.description:
You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real. As long as it is quasi-real, its Strikes deal half damage, it can't critically succeed at any skill check, and creatures attempting saving throws against its spells and effects get a result one degree of success better than they rolled. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

大成功 The target is unaffected.

成功 The target is quasi-real until the end of its next turn.

失败 The target is quasi-real for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt another Will save, ending the spell on a success.

大失败 The target is quasi-real for an unlimited duration.

Unfettered Mark.name: Unfettered Mark
Unfettered Mark.description:
You tattoo the target with rare inks and create a magical tattoo called an unfettered mark. This particular version of the unfettered mark grants the target special powers to escape from the Black Whale and Stormholt (the demiplane that overlaps with the Black Whale). While Crafting is the easiest method for creating this tattoo, the artistry is less important than maintaining a feeling of freedom in your mind while performing the ritual. Because of this, you can use any skill as long as it holds a special significance to you. A ranger who is at home in the woods, for example, could use a Survival or Nature check while creating the tattoo. If the target already has a successful unfettered mark currently active, the magic fades from the old tattoo and is replaced by the results of the new ritual.

The ritual can be performed alone or with the aid of up to 10 secondary casters. Each secondary caster must tattoo themself with their own tattoo and pay the full ritual cost to participate. Creatures currently held captive in the prison have a special relationship with the ritual: for each month they spend drawing memories of home on the walls of their cell, they can reduce the total cost of the ritual by 50 gp.

大成功 The target and primary and secondary casters all gain the ability to leave Stormholt. To do so, they must leave the prison by swimming through the water or by riding in a vessel that is in contact with the water (such as a rowboat). When they reach the great whirlpool, they are pulled under as normal, but instead of being transported to the Flotsam Graveyard in Absalom, they are immediately transported (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{Teleport}) to a location in Absalom of their choice. They also gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing}, and resistance to electricity 10 for the duration of the ritual.

成功 As critical success, except the affected creatures don't gain the benefits of water walk and water breathing.

失败 You create the tattoo but fail to imbue it with magic.

大失败 As failure, but the tattoo also creates an unwholesome bond with the demiplane of Stormholt. For 24 hours, the target and the primary and secondary casters gain a fishlike appearance and are covered in a slimy membrane. They gain the ability to breathe both water and air, but their skin quickly dries out when on land. After 1 hour on land they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, conditions that can be removed only if they reenter water. Additionally, the membrane conducts electricity well, causing them to gain weakness 10 to electricity.
Unfettered Mark.duration: 24 hours until the magic fades; the tattoo is permanent
Unfettered Mark.cost: rare inks and needles worth a total value of 100 gp × the spell level × the target's level

Upheaval.name: Upheaval
Upheaval.description:
The ground in the area shudders and crumbles as huge pillars of stone erupt into the air, rending the terrain around them.

The GM might add additional effects in certain areas. Cliffs might collapse, causing creatures to fall, or a river might be blocked and flood the surrounding area.

  • Stone Debris The area becomes difficult terrain.
  • Rising Pillars Pillars of smooth stone rise from your chosen number of 10-foot squares on a surface in the area, ascending up to 60 feet in height. Each pillar stops when it hits a structure or ceiling unless that structure collapses (see below). The DC to Climb or Grab an Edge on a pillar is 30. Each creature on a pillar after it rises must succeed at a Reflex saving throw or fall off the nearest edge (the creature can choose which edge, if several are equally close). A creature on a pillar that is stopped by a structure falls without attempting a save.
  • Structural Collapse Structures and ceilings might collapse. The GM rolls a flat check for each (DC 14 for a sturdy structure, DC 9 for an average structure and most natural formations, all adjusted higher or lower as the GM sees fit). In general, shoddy structures automatically collapse. A collapse deals 11d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures beneath it; each creature caught in a collapse must attempt a Reflex save to avoid it. If the creature is forced to attempt a Reflex save because it was on a rising pillar, it uses the same result.

大成功 The creature takes half collapse damage.

成功 The creature takes half the collapse damage and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

失败 The creature takes the full collapse damage and falls prone.

大失败 The creature takes the full collapse damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} by debris until it successfully Escapes (DC equal to the spell's save DC).

Vision of Beauty.name: 美丽幻象 Vision of Beauty
Vision of Beauty.description:
你可以在法术射程内的某个位置为目标创造一个他想象中最美丽的生物的幻象。尽管你可以看到幻象的模糊形状，但只有法术的目标才能感受到它的美丽。幻象的效果取决于目标意志豁免的结果。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标被幻象吸引，在1轮内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}。

失败 目标被幻象迷住了，在1轮内陷入呆滞1，并且在1轮内绕过任何明显的危险和敌人，尽可能以最短的路线朝幻象的位置移动。之后，目标被幻象@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}1轮。

大失败 类似于失败，但目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，并且被幻象迷魂1分钟而非1轮。

升阶(+2) 你可以在法术射程内额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Wall of Radiance.name: Wall of Radiance
Wall of Radiance.description:
You form a wall of brilliant light that obscures creatures. You create a thin wall of light in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically. If you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height.

Creatures adjacent to the wall are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}. Creatures that move through the wall take 2d6 fire damage (basic Fortitude save) as the concentrated light burns them.

升阶(4环) The bright light makes it difficult to discern creatures on the other side. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to other creatures on the opposite side of the wall from them. The fire damage increases to 3d6.

Wall of Shadow.name: Wall of Shadow
Wall of Shadow.description:
You form a wall of pure darkness in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically and, if you wish, can be of a shorter length or height. The wall prevents light from passing through and appears as a sheet of pure darkness to creatures observing it.

Creatures without darkvision or those unable to see through darkness can't see creatures on the other side of the wall. The wall is too thin for creatures to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} in the darkness itself, but creatures can Hide from creatures on the other side of the wall as normal.

升阶 (5环) Creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the wall. They treat targets seen through the wall as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

升阶 (7环) Creatures with greater darkvision can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the wall as concealed. All other creatures are unable to see through the darkness at all.

Waters of Prediction.name: Waters of Prediction
Waters of Prediction.description:
You and the secondary casters peer into the still waters of a natural pool or lake to divine your collective future. Over the course of the minute following the ritual's end, the waters display a scene of one possible future involving the primary caster and as many secondary casters as feasible. This scene is usually, but not necessarily, set within the next few days. The future is unwritten, so the casters would be wise to not read guarantees into the cryptic nature of the visions shown in the water.

大成功 The scene gives hints as to at least one danger the casters are likely to face, as well as at least one method of effectively addressing the danger (showing the group examining an area of a wall containing a secret hatch to bypass a trap, for example).

成功 The scene gives a hint as to at least one danger the casters are likely to face, or some cryptic method to effectively address or bypass a danger (such as a scene of lurking trolls, or a scene of the casters lighting several torches and passing them out, but not both).

失败 The scene consists of so many contradictory details that it's impossible to identify a single danger or effective course of action from them.

大失败 The scene is wrong; it shows the casters facing a danger they're unlikely to come across, or encourages actions that hinder a likely upcoming encounter (such as encouraging chopping down several trees before meeting an arboreal or a dryad).
Waters of Prediction.cost: rare incense and herbs worth a total value of 300 gp
Waters of Prediction.primarycheck: Nature or Religion (master, the check has the secret trait)

Web of Influence.name: Web of Influence
Web of Influence.description:
You learn the location of the nearest creature to whom the target is connected in a magical manner. A creature sustaining a spell on the target is connected to it for the purposes of this spell, as are any creatures who are targets of a spell effect currently affecting the target (such as all the targets of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hkfH9Z53hPzcOwNB]{Veil} spell), members of a coven, and creatures that are magically bonded to the target (such as with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dZV8nZUKRhGIr6g9]{Heartbond} ritual). The GM is the final arbiter of whether a creature is magically connected to the target. If you already know individuals who are magically connected to the target, you can exclude them from the spell.

This spell doesn't tell you anything about the nearest magically connected creature other than its current distance and direction. If the nearest creature is on a different plane the spell indicates this but doesn't reveal which plane.

Word of Revision.name: 修正之言 Word of Revision
Word of Revision.description:
触发 射程内的生物豁免检定失败或大失败，或者生命值降低至0；

所有优秀的作家都知道，你不能在故事结束之前就杀死你的主角。当你说出修正之言，你就会改变现实的进程，阻止本应发生的事件，将一个生物从意外或不合理的命运中拯救出来。如果触发的生物在豁免检定中失败，则使其重新掷骰。如果触发生物的豁免检定大失败，则检定结果视为失败。如果触发的生物生命值降低至0点，则其生命值会维持在1点，但仍会受到与伤害来源相关的任何削弱效果。如果一个生物豁免检定大失败的同时生命值降低至0点，你只能选择要修正两个事件中的其中一个。

一个生物受到一次修正之言的影响之后，它将在24小时内免疫其他修正之言的影响，即便是主角中的主角也无法次次都能逃过厄运，因为这是命运所不允许的！

升阶(9环) 你可以将射程内的10个生物作为目标。所有目标必须各自符合触发条件。例如，如果一条龙向你盟友的队伍喷火，那么只有豁免检定失败或大失败，或者生命值降低至0的人才会受到这个法术的影响。

All is One, One is All.name: 一为全，全为一 All is One, One is All
All is One, One is All.description: 你一瞬间将所有目标的肉体与生命力融合又分散回原样。当你在将目标们分散回各自个体时，你可将任意数量的目标与其他目标的位置交换。此外，你还可以重分配目标之间的生命力与苦痛，任意分配所有目标的生命值，但分配完后不能有目标的生命值低于1或是超过上限。
All is One, One is All.target: 你和至多10个自愿且活着的盟友

Color Spray.name: 七彩喷射 Color Spray
Color Spray.description:
旋转变化的色彩根据看到的人的意志豁免影响它们。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} 1轮。

失败 该生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮，并且目眩1分钟。

大失败 该生物震慑（stunned）1轮，目盲1分钟。

Chromatic Ray.name: 七彩射线 Chromatic Ray
Chromatic Ray.description:
你发出一道彩色的光线涌向你的敌人，根据射线的颜色决定其魔法效果。尝试一次法术攻击骰。如果你命中，骰 [[/r 1d4]]{1d4}决定你放出是那种光束。如果该射线造成伤害，该伤害在重击时翻倍。在颜色后面的括号中列出了其为射线所增加的特征。

  1. 红 (火焰) 该射线对目标造成[[/r 30[fire]]]伤害。
  2. 橙 (酸液) 该射线对目标造成[[/r 40[acid]]]伤害。
  3. 黄 (电击) 该射线对目标造成[[/r 50[electricity]]]伤害。
  4. 绿 (毒素) 该射线对目标造成 [[/r 25 [poison]]]伤害，并且该目标必须成功通过一次强韧豁免，否则 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}持续1分钟（重击时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}）。

升阶 (6环级) [[/r 40[fire]]]{红}, [[/r 50[acid]]]{橙}, [[/r 60[electricity]]]{黄}和 [[/r 35 [poison]]]{绿}对应的伤害各增加10。骰 [[/r 1d8]]{1d8}决定射线的颜色，对于1-4的结果使用上文，对于5-8的结果使用后文。

  1. 蓝 该射线具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone}的效果。在重击时，该目标只要被石化术的效果所@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}，就会获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}。
  2. 靛 (情绪, 失能, 心灵) 该射线具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{困惑术 Confusion}的效果。在重击时，其改为具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{心灵扭曲 Warp Mind}的效果。
  3. 紫 该目标被 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}1分钟。它必须尝试一次意志豁免，否则会被传送到直接远离你120尺远的位置（如果哪里没有足够的空间令其出现，它在最近的开放空间中出现）；这是一个传送效果。
  4. 饱和颜色 目标 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} 直到你的下个回合结束，或者你的攻击骰为重击时为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}。再骰一次，并附加另一个颜色的效果（重骰8的结果）。

Chromatic Armor.name: 七彩护甲 Chromatic Armor
Chromatic Armor.description:
你用数层七彩虹光组成的护甲包裹目标。该护甲产生20尺的明亮光照（以及后续20尺昏暗光照）。每当一个生物攻击目标，并且与其相邻时，攻击者必须在其动作结束时尝试一次意志豁免。在失败时，它直到其下个回合结束获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}。无论豁免骰结果威吓，攻击者直到其下个回合结束都暂时免疫。该目眩效果具有光亮和视觉特征。

当你施放该法术时，骰 [[/r 2d8]]{1d8 两次}，根据下表决定护甲的颜色（重骰任何重复结果）。每种颜色赋予对应伤害类型的抗力5。如果你花费三个动作来施放该法术，改为 [[/r 3d8]]{骰三次}。

  1. 红 火焰
  2. 橙 酸
  3. 黄 电击
  4. 绿 毒素
  5. 蓝 音波
  6. 靛 心灵
  7. 紫 力场
  8. 匹配颜色 护甲变为对应目标最近一次承受的伤害类型的颜色。如果它没有承受任何这七种类型的伤害，或者护甲已经是这种颜色，再骰一次，重骰任何为8的结果。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.DHYWmMGmKOpRSqza]{法术效果：七彩护甲}

升阶 (+3) 该抗力增加5。

Chromatic Wall.name: 七彩法墙 Chromatic Wall
Chromatic Wall.description:
你创造一个由某种鲜艳光芒组成的不透明墙壁。墙壁形状笔直并垂直地面，长60尺高30尺。如果墙壁会穿过生物，你失去该法术。墙壁在两侧产生20尺明亮光照，在后续20尺产生昏暗光照。你可以无视该墙的效果。

骰1d4，决定墙壁的颜色。每个颜色对于尝试穿过的物品，效果或者生物都有特定效果。七彩法墙无法被常规反制；但是每个颜色会在被特定法术作为目标是自动反制，即使该法术的环级低于七彩法墙。

  1. 1 红色 该墙摧毁穿过的远程武器弹药（例如箭和弩矢），并对任何穿过墙壁的目标造成15火焰伤害，这有一次基础反射豁免。寒冰锥能反制红色七彩法墙。
  2. 2 橙色 该墙摧毁穿过的投掷武器，并对任何穿过墙壁的目标造成20酸液伤害，这有一次基础反射豁免。 造风术（Gust of wind）能反制橙色七彩法墙。
  3. 3 黄色 该墙阻挡酸，寒冷，电击，力场，负能量，正能量，以及音波效果，并对任何穿过墙壁的目标造成25电击伤害，这有一次基础反射豁免。解离术能反制黄色七彩法墙。
  4. 4 绿色 该墙阻挡毒气，气体，以及喷吐武器。对任何穿过墙壁的目标造成10毒素伤害，并使它们获得， @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} 持续1分钟。基础强韧豁免可以减少伤害，并且在成功时无效力竭效果。穿墙术能反制绿色七彩法墙。

升阶 (7环) 该法术的持续时间增加到1小时。投掷1d8来决定墙壁的颜色；对于5-8的结果如下所述。红色，橙色，黄色或者绿色的墙造成额外10伤害。

  1. 5 蓝色 该墙壁阻挡听觉，石化，音波以及视觉效果，并且穿过墙壁的目标会承受石化术（flesh to stone）的效果。魔法飞弹（Magic missile）能反制蓝色七彩法墙。
  2. 6 靛蓝 该墙阻挡预言和心灵效果，并且穿过墙壁的目标会承受心灵扭曲（warp mind）的效果。灼热光辉（Searing light）能反制靛蓝七彩法墙。
  3. 7 紫色 墙阻挡法术从对面指定目标（区域效果如常穿过）。穿过墙壁的生物或承受 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} ，持续1分钟；在大失败时，该生物改为如异界传送的效果被送往其他位面。解除魔法能反制紫色七彩法墙。
  4. 8 重骰, 并且穿过该墙的生物在豁免上承受-2环境减值。

Chromatic Image.name: 七彩镜影 Chromatic Image
Chromatic Image.description:
你唤出三个自身的幻影，四个你会具有不同的颜色，并且你们的颜色每当有人攻击你的时候都会变换。这具有 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{镜影术 Mirror Image}的效果，除了每当一个敌人摧毁影子之一时，骰 [[/r 1d4]]{1d4} 决定影子被摧毁时的颜色。该攻击者承受对应的效果。

  1. 红 [[/r 5[fire]]]伤害和[[/r 5[mental]]]伤害。
  2. 橙 [[/r 5[acid]]]伤害和[[/r 5[mental]]]伤害。
  3. 黄 [[/r 5[electricity]]]伤害和[[/r 5[mental]]]伤害。
  4. 绿 [[/r 5 [poison]]]伤害和[[/r 5[mental]]]伤害，并且它获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

Triple Time.name: 三拍子 Triple Time
Triple Time.description:
你以活跃的节奏起舞，加速你盟友的移动。你和所有区域内的盟友的所有速度获得+10尺状态加值，持续1轮。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.HtaDbgTIzdiTiKLX]{法术效果：三拍子}

Threefold Aspect.name: 三相 Threefold Aspect
Threefold Aspect.description:
此法术令你能够在自身的三个不同年龄状态中转换：少女（青年），母亲（成年），老妪（老年）。在 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放该法术 Cast the Spell}时选择其中之一。在法术持续时间内，你可以通过一个具有专注特征的单动作，改变到三个年龄状态中任一或者你正常的年龄状态。你的外形无论年龄如何看起来总是像你，认识你的生物仍然能认出你，并且可以发现你的年龄不一样了。

三相 改变你的物理外观和性格，以展现你不同年龄中的逼真形象。这会令你在假装成选择的年龄的欺骗上获得+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训，也能将等级作为熟练加值加到这些检定上。除此之外，除非一个生物专门使用 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} 动作，或者用其他方式仔细检查你，它无法进一步了解你不处于你的真实年龄。你可以 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{解消 Dismiss} 该法术。
Threefold Aspect.duration: 直到你下次进行日常准备

Updraft.name: 上升气流 Updraft
Updraft.description:
一阵强风自地面喷发而出，将目标抛至半空并使其坠落。坠落时受到2d6钝击伤害，基础反射豁免。豁免失败时，目标被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

升阶（+1） 伤害提升2d6。

Tireless Worker.name: 不倦苦工 Tireless Worker
Tireless Worker.description: 你选择在后面列出的且正影响目标的一个状态进行压制：@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{超载 Encumbered}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。如果你并没有移除造成该状态的效果，该状态会在法术持续时间结束后重新生效。

Blessing of Defiance.name: 不屈祝福 Blessing of Defiance
Blessing of Defiance.description:
通过引出面对逆境而坚持不懈的力量，你赋予目标对抗危险和避免伤害的能力。选择一种豁免骰：强韧，反射或者意志。目标在该豁免骰上获得+4状态加值，持续1轮。此祝福的效果和目标数量取决于你在施放该法术时花费的动作数量。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.FD9Ce5pqcZYstcMI]{法术效果：不屈祝福}

1 (姿势) 法术以你或者射程内一个自愿盟友为目标。

2 (语言) 法术以你或者射程内一个自愿盟友为目标。如果你选择强韧，目标获得对毒素抗力15。如果你选择反射，目标在其各速度上获得+15尺状态加值。如果你选择意志，目标获得对心灵伤害抗力15。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.w9HpSwBLByNyRXvi]{法术效果：不屈祝福(2动作)}

3 (语言) 法术以你以及30尺内所有自愿盟友为目标。

Brand the Impenitent.name: 不悔烙印 Brand the Impenitent
Brand the Impenitent.description:
你用你信仰的神的宗教符号的一个虚幻的复制品来标记目标。这个标记无法隐藏，但它只对你同样信仰的信徒可见，对他们而言就像点燃的火炬一样清晰。你同样信仰的信徒忽略目标的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 状态（如果有的话），目标在受到你同样信仰的信徒的攻击时将获得-1的AC状态罚值。如果目标是你信仰的神的信徒中声誉良好，法术失败。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 法术持续1轮

失败 法术持续1分钟

大失败 法术持续时间为永久

Continual Flame.name: 不灭明焰 Continual Flame
Continual Flame.description:
一团魔法的火焰从物体上喷出，如同火炬一般明亮。它不需要氧气，不会与水反应，也不发出热量。

升阶 (+1) 消耗按照后文增加：

  • 3环级16gp；
  • 4环级30gp；
  • 5环级60gp；
  • 6环级120gp；
  • 7环级270gp；
  • 8环级540gp；
  • 9环级1350gp；
  • 10环级3350gp。

Fallow Field.name: 不生力场 Fallow Field
Fallow Field.description:
覆盖法术区域的恶心黄色光氛随着阻碍治疗的熵能力场一同出现。当法术区域内的生物，因为治疗效果或快速治疗或再生等能力回复生命值时，须进行意志豁免。

大成功 该生物回复正常量的生命值，且在1分钟内免疫此效果

成功 该生物回复正常量的生命值

失败 该生物回复一半的生命值

大失败 该生物不因其治疗效果回复任何生命值

Inexhaustible Cynicism.name: 不竭猜忌 Inexhaustible Cynicism
Inexhaustible Cynicism.description:
你令目标对周围的所有人和所有事物都产生彻底的怀疑。在持续时间中，每个目标都不自愿接受任何需要自愿目标的效果（以免该效果是某种攻击），拒绝摄入任何东西（以免该物质被换成了有毒或者有诅咒的替代物），不将任何人视为盟友（以免其朋友被假扮者所替代），并且不相信任何告知他们的话（以免这是谎言，但这不表示该生物会自动相信对立面）。它甚至不会完全相信其自身回忆知识的能力，因为它认为自己可能想起错误的信息，如回忆知识检定大失败的结果。

最后，该生物在其每轮结束时承受6d6心灵伤害（没有豁免），除非它在这回合花费至少1动作搜索或者用其他方式和其环境交互，以尝试不相信那些它觉得明显在周围的幻觉。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到影响1轮。

失败 该生物受到影响1分钟。

大失败 该生物受到影响1小时。

Clownish Curse.name: 丑角诅咒 Clownish Curse
Clownish Curse.description:
你用诅咒折磨目标，使其在移动时发出可笑的声音。此外，目标的手和脚会变得笨拙且不协调，就像戴着超大的手套和鞋子一样。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 在1轮内，目标试图进行特技、隐秘或贼活检定时，必须掷骰两次并使用较差的结果。如果目标在特技、隐秘或贼活检定中掷骰失败，结果将改为大失败。

失败 如同成功，但效果是1小时。

大失败 如同成功，但效果永久。

Personal Rain Cloud.name: 专属雨云 Personal Rain Cloud
Personal Rain Cloud.description:
你召唤出一块 5 尺宽的雨云，它会跟着目标移动。它保持在头顶大约一臂的长度，除非它被天花板压迫必须降低高度。云雨不断地落在目标上，使其保持湿润，并在任何移动后湿润身后的地面。雨会熄灭非魔法火焰。目标获得 2 点火焰抗力。对水有弱点的生物在每个回合结束时所受的伤害等于其弱点。生物可以尝试反射豁免来避开雨云。

升阶 (+1) 火焰抗力增加 2 点。

Focusing Hum.name: 专注嗡鸣 Focusing Hum
Focusing Hum.description: 你给周围的空气注入持续的嗡嗡声，协助范围内的生物抵抗干扰。陷入呆滞的生物在该区域内施法时，其纯骰检定的DC低2点。陷入困惑的生物，在该区域内时不会攻击任何人，包括它自己，取而代之的是它会失去连贯说话的能力。你尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}的隐秘检定有-2减值。

Forbidding Ward.name: 严厉护卫 Forbidding Ward
Forbidding Ward.description:
你保护一个盟友，以抵御目标敌人的攻击和敌对法术。目标盟友在对抗目标敌人的攻击，法术和其他效果上对护甲等级获得+1状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.ctMxYPGEpstvhW9C]{法术效果：严厉护卫}

升阶 (6环级) 该状态加值增加到+2。

Neutralize Poison.name: 中和毒性 Neutralize Poison
Neutralize Poison.description: 你将治疗魔法灌入目标，尝试治愈它正遭受的一项毒素。尝试一次对抗该毒素的反制检定。

Temporary Glyph.name: 临时刻文 Temporary Glyph
Temporary Glyph.description:
区域 一个5尺方格

你将一个敌对法术暂时放入一个符号中。当施放该法术时，你也施放一个更低环级的法术并存入刻文中。该法术必须花费2动作或更少来施放、具有敌对效果、能以一个生物为目标或者具有一个区域。任何进入临时刻文区域的生物会激活该刻文，释放其中的有害法术。你可以给刻文设定一个密语。在进入该法术区域时念出密语能避免该刻文被触发。你可以设置更专门的触发器，来限制哪一类生物可以引发刻文（核心规则书 305页）。

当一个法术被存于刻文内后，刻文获得该法术的所有特征。如果该储存的法术能以一个或更多生物为目标，它以那个触发该刻文的生物为目标。如果该法术具有区域，该区域以引发刻文的生物为中心。当刻文被触发时，临时刻文的持续时间结束。该刻文是魔法陷阱，使用你的法术DC作为发现它所需的察觉检定DC以及解除它所需的贼活检定DC；这两种检定均要求进行尝试的生物为受训才可能成功。

你可以解消临时刻文。

Temporary Tool.name: 临时工具 Temporary Tool
Temporary Tool.description: 你将一个临时的简单工具，如铲子或绳子变出你的手中。它持续到它被用于一个简单活动或1分钟，以先到者为准，然后消失。这个工具是用法术临时变化的，因此不能作为正品出售或冒充。

Final Sacrifice.name: 临终献身 Final Sacrifice
Final Sacrifice.description:
